mapper.insert: INSERT INTO course_table (name, teacher, max_vol, destination, start_time, end_time) VALUES(#{name},#{teacher_id},#{max_vol},#{destination},#{start_time},#{end_time})
mapper.select: SELECT c.id as id, c.name as name, u.id as teacher_id, u.name as teacher_name, c.max_vol as max_vol, c.destination as destination, c.start_time as start_time, c.end_time as end_time, c.real_vol as real_vol FROM user_table u,course_student cs,course_table c WHERE cs.student=#{student_id} and u.id=c.teacher
